thoughts.text: I think I need to modify the command to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable to use the correct syntax for the file containing the Twitter API credentials.
thoughts.reasoning: The contents of the file containing the Twitter API credentials indicate that the correct syntax for setting the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable is to use the value of the API_KEY variable.
thoughts.plan:
- Modify the command to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable to use the value of the API_KEY variable
- Execute the modified command to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable
- Execute the modified Python script to authenticate the Twitter API
- Use the Twitter API to search for tweets with information on both language learning resources and travel guides
- Explore the tweets and make note of any useful resources
- Begin learning a new language and planning a trip to a new location
